descript.abstract: The parcel level flood information fields for the predicted and projected flood surfaces, including Category 1 risk, were calculated by finding the mean value (%) and populating the database with those values. The hindcasted and FEMA proposed flood zone fields represent the calculated ratio (0 to 1) of each parcel that falls within the areas hindcasted or defined (FEMA). The average elevation and minimum elevation of the parcel is also included (from Lidar).Fields/Attributes – APN, Parcel identification numberCAT1%, Average percent risk predicted within parcel of category 1 inundationELEVATION, Average elevation of parcelFEMA_%, Percent of parcel falling within FEMA A zoneGS%, Average percent risk predicted within parcel of yearly inundationGS_2035%, Average percent risk projected within parcel of yearly inundation in 2035GS_2060%, Average percent risk projected within parcel of category 1 inundationJOA_%, Percent of parcel falling within hindcasted Hurricane Joaquin inundationMEAN_ELEV, Average elevation of parcelMIN_ELEV, Minimum elevation of parcelMTHW_%, Percent of parcel falling within hindcasted Hurricane Matthew inundation
descript.purpose: Pertinent flooding projections, hindcasts, and predictions from surfaces developed in the study were conflated to a parcel vector file. This layer was developed to facilitate queries to develop actionable plans.

idinfo.useconst: Not intended for insurance or FEMA rate maps.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.5.0.6491

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
